title: Collusion
description: Represents the relationship between insiders. For the purposes of the `recruitment` property, insider 1 recruited insider 2.

id.description: A unique string that begins with "collusion--" and is appended with a UUIDv4.

insider1.description: The id of the first insider.

insider2.description: The id of the second insider

relationship.description: The type of relationship between insider1 and insider2.

oneOf.title: Avoid Detection
oneOf.description: Insider 1 needed insider 2's access or authorization to avoid detection.

oneOf.title: Greater Payoff
oneOf.description: Insider 1 received a greater payoff by recruiting insider 2.

oneOf.title: Insider Resigned
oneOf.description: Insider 1 no longer worked at the victim organization and needed insider 2 to finish the incident.

oneOf.title: Separation of Duties
oneOf.description: Insider 1 could not conduct acheive their goals without insider 2 due to a separationi of duties which limited their access of authorization.

oneOf.title: Share the Wealth
oneOf.description: Insider 1 recruited insider 2 due to a desire to share the wealth.

oneOf.title: Other
oneOf.description: Insider 1 recruited insider 2 for unknown reasons.
